Articles.Content:
My laptop is amusing slow, Intel Core 2 @ 1.66GHz and I'm having trouble getting my latest ship into orbit. Could someone do me a favour and get it into orbit for me? Only stock parts used and the craft is sitting on the launchpad ready to go. Checked everything with Kerbal Engineer so it should easily get there, it just that it takes literally an hour sometimes getting into orbit!

Thanks

https://raw.github.com/SonnyJim/ksp/master/sonny_jim.sfs
It looks way more complicated than it needs to be. Can you provide the craft file?
I'll do it tomorrow morning. but i do wonder - why play ksp if you can't launch your own rockets?
This seems less challenge and more like 'do the hard work for me because I don't want to try and make a craft my computer can handle'

what mods are you using? i really want to get this to work for you.

I just recently upgraded to a super-powered gaming pc, but I had to use a laptop for the longest time, and it was horrible. I feel your pain bro.

Yea this ship may use stock parts, but there's others in the save which have modded parts. I got the ship up to 90k but at that point there was no more launch stage and the ship had a bunch of tanks but just one nuke to push it.

Why don't you just hyperedit the payload into orbit?

Remember, smaller is always better.
